casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gyrell Shavonta LEE 335PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2017 Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, Durham, for Lee, Gyrell Shavonta. Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Camden R. Webb, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cato Institute.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of May 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
